member.name: T:Ditto.Benchmarking.Tests.BenchmarkAttribute
member.summary: The attribute to use to mark methods as being the targets of benchmarking.

member.name: T:Ditto.Benchmarking.Tests.Benchmark
member.summary: Very simple benchmarking framework. Looks for all types in the current assembly which have public static parameterless methods marked with the Benchmark attribute. In addition, if there are public static Init, Reset and Check methods with appropriate parameters (a string array for Init, nothing for Reset or Check) these are called at appropriate times.

member.name: F:Ditto.Benchmarking.Tests.Benchmark.runIterations
member.summary: Number of times to run the methods in each type.

member.name: M:Ditto.Benchmarking.Tests.Benchmark.ParseCommandLine(System.String[])
member.summary: Parses the command line, returning an array of strings which are the arguments the tasks should receive. This array will definitely be non-null, even if null is passed in originally.

member.name: M:Ditto.Benchmarking.Tests.Benchmark.PrintEnvironment
member.summary: Prints out information about the operating environment.
